subject: [PATCH v4 19/25] fuse: add io-uring kernel-managed buffer ring

reviews.author: Joanne Koong
reviews.summary: Raised questions about the handling of 0-byte payloads and the order of fuse_uring_headers_cleanup() and fuse_uring_get_next_fuse_req().

2026-02-25.patch_summary: The patch adds kernel-managed buffer ring support for io-uring in the FUSE filesystem.
